subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: The skier, who tore two ligaments in a crash last year, said she would have surgery soon, sidelining her for the season and robbing the American team of much of its star power.
snippet: The skier, who tore two ligaments in a crash last year, said she would have surgery soon, sidelining her for the season and robbing the American team of much of its star power.
